divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in my backyard scanning the skies as I usually do when I noticed a small dull blue orb traveling high in the eastern sky. It traveled to the southeast until losing sight of it. I then looked to the south and noticed another orb amber orange in color traveling to the extreme south. there was a small airplane above the object traveling west. The plane turned out being a pretty good gauge of the objects position and size. I watched the object until it disappeared below the southern horizon. Activity in this area has been pretty low recently but it appears it's ramping up again.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were no other sightings in Kingman on or around May 26th 2011
